plot: After tolerating one too many evils, a female vigilante is on a mission to break all the rules- and write her own in the name of justice.
plot_en: After tolerating one too many evils, a female vigilante is on a mission to break all the rules- and write her own in the name of justice.
plot_es: After tolerating one too many evils, a female vigilante is on a mission to break all the rules- and write her own in the name of justice.
title: Bad Ass
